creditline: Bequest of John R. Van Derlip in memory of Ethel Morrison Van Derlip
description: Towel scarf, tan linen, loosely woven with heavy linen lozenges and dots down length of panels, and four floral sprays in yellow-green silk and metal threads embroidered at each end. Plain linen fringe below grapevine border in same threads as on sprays.
title: Towel scarf
